The table provided shows the daily total cost data for Hansel’s Hot Sauce. If the average fixed cost was $5 per case, how many cases of hot sauce had Hansel’s Hot Sauce produced?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
